price: 221. ¿Quieren que les diga sobre quién descienden los demonios?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
